00092 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8 && SIZEOF_INT == 4
00093 #define ddLCHash2(f,g,shift) \
00094 ((((unsigned)(unsigned long)(f) * DD_P1 + \
00095    (unsigned)(unsigned long)(g)) * DD_P2) >> (shift))
00096 #else
00097 #define ddLCHash2(f,g,shift) \
00098 ((((unsigned)(f) * DD_P1 + (unsigned)(g)) * DD_P2) >> (shift))
00099 #endif
00100 
00101 
00113 #define ddLCHash3(f,g,h,shift) ddCHash2(f,g,h,shift)

00122 static void cuddLocalCacheResize ARGS((DdLocalCache *cache));
00123 DD_INLINE static unsigned int ddLCHash ARGS((DdNodePtr *key, unsigned int keysize, int shift));
00124 static void cuddLocalCacheAddToList ARGS((DdLocalCache *cache));
00125 static void cuddLocalCacheRemoveFromList ARGS((DdLocalCache *cache));

00140 
00153 DdLocalCache *
00154 cuddLocalCacheInit(
00155   DdManager * manager /* manager */,
00156   unsigned int  keySize /* size of the key (number of operands) */,
00157   unsigned int  cacheSize /* Initial size of the cache */,
00158   unsigned int  maxCacheSize /* Size of the cache beyond which no resizing occurs */)
00159 {
00160     DdLocalCache *cache;
00161     int logSize;
00162 
00163     cache = ALLOC(DdLocalCache,1);
00164     if (cache == NULL) {
00165         manager->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00166         return(NULL);
00167     }
00168     cache->manager = manager;
00169     cache->keysize = keySize;
00170     cache->itemsize = (keySize + 1) * sizeof(DdNode *);
00171 #ifdef DD_CACHE_PROFILE
00172     cache->itemsize += sizeof(ptrint);
00173 #endif
00174     logSize = cuddComputeFloorLog2(ddMax(cacheSize,manager->slots/2));
00175     cacheSize = 1 << logSize;
00176     cache->item = (DdLocalCacheItem *)
00177         ALLOC(char, cacheSize * cache->itemsize);
00178     if (cache->item == NULL) {
00179         manager->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00180         FREE(cache);
00181         return(NULL);
00182     }
00183     cache->slots = cacheSize;
00184     cache->shift = sizeof(int) * 8 - logSize;
00185     cache->maxslots = ddMin(maxCacheSize,manager->slots);
00186     cache->minHit = manager->minHit;
00187     /* Initialize to avoid division by 0 and immediate resizing. */
00188     cache->lookUps = (double) (int) (cacheSize * cache->minHit + 1);
00189     cache->hits = 0;
00190     manager->memused += cacheSize * cache->itemsize + sizeof(DdLocalCache);
00191 
00192     /* Initialize the cache. */
00193     memset(cache->item, 0, cacheSize * cache->itemsize);
00194 
00195     /* Add to manager's list of local caches for GC. */
00196     cuddLocalCacheAddToList(cache);
00197 
00198     return(cache);
00199 
00200 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheInit */
00201 
00202 
00216 void
00217 cuddLocalCacheQuit(
00218   DdLocalCache * cache /* cache to be shut down */)
00219 {
00220     cache->manager->memused -=
00221         cache->slots * cache->itemsize + sizeof(DdLocalCache);
00222     cuddLocalCacheRemoveFromList(cache);
00223     FREE(cache->item);
00224     FREE(cache);
00225 
00226     return;
00227 
00228 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheQuit */

00230 
00242 void
00243 cuddLocalCacheInsert(
00244   DdLocalCache * cache,
00245   DdNodePtr * key,
00246   DdNode * value)
00247 {
00248     unsigned int posn;
00249     DdLocalCacheItem *entry;
00250 
00251     posn = ddLCHash(key,cache->keysize,cache->shift);
00252     entry = (DdLocalCacheItem *) ((char *) cache->item +
00253                                   posn * cache->itemsize);
00254     memcpy(entry->key,key,cache->keysize * sizeof(DdNode *));
00255     entry->value = value;
00256 #ifdef DD_CACHE_PROFILE
00257     entry->count++;
00258 #endif
00259 
00260 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheInsert */
00261 
00262 
00275 DdNode *
00276 cuddLocalCacheLookup(
00277   DdLocalCache * cache,
00278   DdNodePtr * key)
00279 {
00280     unsigned int posn;
00281     DdLocalCacheItem *entry;
00282     DdNode *value;
00283 
00284     cache->lookUps++;
00285     posn = ddLCHash(key,cache->keysize,cache->shift);
00286     entry = (DdLocalCacheItem *) ((char *) cache->item +
00287                                   posn * cache->itemsize);
00288     if (entry->value != NULL &&
00289         memcmp(key,entry->key,cache->keysize*sizeof(DdNode *)) == 0) {
00290         cache->hits++;
00291         value = Cudd_Regular(entry->value);
00292         if (value->ref == 0) {
00293             cuddReclaim(cache->manager,value);
00294         }
00295         return(entry->value);
00296     }
00297 
00298     /* Cache miss: decide whether to resize */
00299 
00300     if (cache->slots < cache->maxslots &&
00301         cache->hits > cache->lookUps * cache->minHit) {
00302         cuddLocalCacheResize(cache);
00303     }
00304 
00305     return(NULL);
00306 
00307 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheLookup */
00308

00322 void
00323 cuddLocalCacheClearDead(
00324   DdManager * manager)
00325 {
00326     DdLocalCache *cache = manager->localCaches;
00327     unsigned int keysize;
00328     unsigned int itemsize;
00329     unsigned int slots;
00330     DdLocalCacheItem *item;
00331 #ifdef __osf__
00332 #pragma pointer_size save
00333 #pragma pointer_size short
00334 #endif
00335     DdNode **key;
00336 #ifdef __osf__
00337 #pragma pointer_size restore
00338 #endif
00339     unsigned int i, j;
00340 
00341     while (cache != NULL) {
00342         keysize = cache->keysize;
00343         itemsize = cache->itemsize;
00344         slots = cache->slots;
00345         item = cache->item;
00346         for (i = 0; i < slots; i++) {
00347             if (Cudd_Regular(item->value)->ref == 0) {
00348                 item->value = NULL;
00349             } else {
00350                 key = item->key;
00351                 for (j = 0; j < keysize; j++) {
00352                     if (Cudd_Regular(key[j])->ref == 0) {
00353                         item->value = NULL;
00354                         break;
00355                     }
00356                 }
00357             }
00358             item = (DdLocalCacheItem *) ((char *) item + itemsize);
00359         }
00360         cache = cache->next;
00361     }
00362     return;
00363 
00364 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheClearDead */

00379 void
00380 cuddLocalCacheClearAll(
00381   DdManager * manager)
00382 {
00383     DdLocalCache *cache = manager->localCaches;
00384 
00385     while (cache != NULL) {
00386         memset(cache->item, 0, cache->slots * cache->itemsize);
00387         cache = cache->next;
00388     }
00389     return;
00390 
00391 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheClearAll */

00394 #ifdef DD_CACHE_PROFILE
00395 
00396 #define DD_HYSTO_BINS 8
00397 
00410 int
00411 cuddLocalCacheProfile(
00412   DdLocalCache * cache)
00413 {
00414     double count, mean, meansq, stddev, expected;
00415     long max, min;
00416     int imax, imin;
00417     int i, retval, slots;
00418     long *hystogram;
00419     int nbins = DD_HYSTO_BINS;
00420     int bin;
00421     long thiscount;
00422     double totalcount;
00423     int nzeroes;
00424     DdLocalCacheItem *entry;
00425 
00426     slots = cache->slots;
00427 
00428     meansq = mean = expected = 0.0;
00429     max = min = (long) cache->item[0].count;
00430     imax = imin = nzeroes = 0;
00431     totalcount = 0.0;
00432 
00433     hystogram = ALLOC(long, nbins);
00434     if (hystogram == NULL) {
00435         return(0);
00436     }
00437     for (i = 0; i < nbins; i++) {
00438         hystogram[i] = 0;
00439     }
00440 
00441     for (i = 0; i < slots; i++) {
00442         entry = (DdLocalCacheItem *) ((char *) cache->item +
00443                                       i * cache->itemsize);
00444         thiscount = (long) entry->count;
00445         if (thiscount > max) {
00446             max = thiscount;
00447             imax = i;
00448         }
00449         if (thiscount < min) {
00450             min = thiscount;
00451             imin = i;
00452         }
00453         if (thiscount == 0) {
00454             nzeroes++;
00455         }
00456         count = (double) thiscount;
00457         mean += count;
00458         meansq += count * count;
00459         totalcount += count;
00460         expected += count * (double) i;
00461         bin = (i * nbins) / slots;
00462         hystogram[bin] += thiscount;
00463     }
00464     mean /= (double) slots;
00465     meansq /= (double) slots;
00466     stddev = sqrt(meansq - mean*mean);
00467 
00468     retval = fprintf(stdout,"Cache stats: slots = %d average = %g ", slots, mean);
00469     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00470     retval = fprintf(stdout,"standard deviation = %g\n", stddev);
00471     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00472     retval = fprintf(stdout,"Cache max accesses = %ld for slot %d\n", max, imax);
00473     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00474     retval = fprintf(stdout,"Cache min accesses = %ld for slot %d\n", min, imin);
00475     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00476     retval = fprintf(stdout,"Cache unused slots = %d\n", nzeroes);
00477     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00478 
00479     if (totalcount) {
00480         expected /= totalcount;
00481         retval = fprintf(stdout,"Cache access hystogram for %d bins", nbins);
00482         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00483         retval = fprintf(stdout," (expected bin value = %g)\n# ", expected);
00484         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00485         for (i = nbins - 1; i>=0; i--) {
00486             retval = fprintf(stdout,"%ld ", hystogram[i]);
00487             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00488         }
00489         retval = fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00490         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00491     }
00492 
00493     FREE(hystogram);
00494     return(1);
00495 
00496 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheProfile */
00497 #endif

00499 
00512 DdHashTable *
00513 cuddHashTableInit(
00514   DdManager * manager,
00515   unsigned int  keySize,
00516   unsigned int  initSize)
00517 {
00518     DdHashTable *hash;
00519     int logSize;
00520 
00521 #ifdef __osf__
00522 #pragma pointer_size save
00523 #pragma pointer_size short
00524 #endif
00525     hash = ALLOC(DdHashTable, 1);
00526     if (hash == NULL) {
00527         manager->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00528         return(NULL);
00529     }
00530     hash->keysize = keySize;
00531     hash->manager = manager;
00532     hash->memoryList = NULL;
00533     hash->nextFree = NULL;
00534     hash->itemsize = (keySize + 1) * sizeof(DdNode *) +
00535         sizeof(ptrint) + sizeof(DdHashItem *);
00536     /* We have to guarantee that the shift be < 32. */
00537     if (initSize < 2) initSize = 2;
00538     logSize = cuddComputeFloorLog2(initSize);
00539     hash->numBuckets = 1 << logSize;
00540     hash->shift = sizeof(int) * 8 - logSize;
00541     hash->bucket = ALLOC(DdHashItem *, hash->numBuckets);
00542     if (hash->bucket == NULL) {
00543         manager->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00544         FREE(hash);
00545         return(NULL);
00546     }
00547     memset(hash->bucket, 0, hash->numBuckets * sizeof(DdHashItem *));
00548     hash->size = 0;
00549     hash->maxsize = hash->numBuckets * DD_MAX_HASHTABLE_DENSITY;
00550 #ifdef __osf__
00551 #pragma pointer_size restore
00552 #endif
00553     return(hash);
00554 
00555 } /* end of cuddHashTableInit */
00556 
00557 
00569 void
00570 cuddHashTableQuit(
00571   DdHashTable * hash)
00572 {
00573 #ifdef __osf__
00574 #pragma pointer_size save
00575 #pragma pointer_size short
00576 #endif
00577     unsigned int i;
00578     DdManager *dd = hash->manager;
00579     DdHashItem *bucket;
00580     DdHashItem **memlist, **nextmem;
00581     unsigned int numBuckets = hash->numBuckets;
00582 
00583     for (i = 0; i < numBuckets; i++) {
00584         bucket = hash->bucket[i];
00585         while (bucket != NULL) {
00586             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, bucket->value);
00587             bucket = bucket->next;
00588         }
00589     }
00590 
00591     memlist = hash->memoryList;
00592     while (memlist != NULL) {
00593         nextmem = (DdHashItem **) memlist[0];
00594         FREE(memlist);
00595         memlist = nextmem;
00596     }
00597 
00598     FREE(hash->bucket);
00599     FREE(hash);
00600 #ifdef __osf__
00601 #pragma pointer_size restore
00602 #endif
00603 
00604     return;
00605 
00606 } /* end of cuddHashTableQuit */
00607 
00608 
00622 int
00623 cuddHashTableInsert(
00624   DdHashTable * hash,
00625   DdNodePtr * key,
00626   DdNode * value,
00627   ptrint count)
00628 {
00629     int result;
00630     unsigned int posn;
00631     DdHashItem *item;
00632     unsigned int i;
00633 
00634 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00635     assert(hash->keysize > 3);
00636 #endif
00637 
00638     if (hash->size > hash->maxsize) {
00639         result = cuddHashTableResize(hash);
00640         if (result == 0) return(0);
00641     }
00642     item = cuddHashTableAlloc(hash);
00643     if (item == NULL) return(0);
00644     hash->size++;
00645     item->value = value;
00646     cuddRef(value);
00647     item->count = count;
00648     for (i = 0; i < hash->keysize; i++) {
00649         item->key[i] = key[i];
00650     }
00651     posn = ddLCHash(key,hash->keysize,hash->shift);
00652     item->next = hash->bucket[posn];
00653     hash->bucket[posn] = item;
00654 
00655     return(1);
00656 
00657 } /* end of cuddHashTableInsert */
00658 
00659 
00677 DdNode *
00678 cuddHashTableLookup(
00679   DdHashTable * hash,
00680   DdNodePtr * key)
00681 {
00682     unsigned int posn;
00683     DdHashItem *item, *prev;
00684     unsigned int i, keysize;
00685 
00686 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00687     assert(hash->keysize > 3);
00688 #endif
00689 
00690     posn = ddLCHash(key,hash->keysize,hash->shift);
00691     item = hash->bucket[posn];
00692     prev = NULL;
00693 
00694     keysize = hash->keysize;
00695     while (item != NULL) {
00696         DdNodePtr *key2 = item->key;
00697         int equal = 1;
00698         for (i = 0; i < keysize; i++) {
00699             if (key[i] != key2[i]) {
00700                 equal = 0;
00701                 break;
00702             }
00703         }
00704         if (equal) {
00705             DdNode *value = item->value;
00706             cuddSatDec(item->count);
00707             if (item->count == 0) {
00708                 cuddDeref(value);
00709                 if (prev == NULL) {
00710                     hash->bucket[posn] = item->next;
00711                 } else {
00712                     prev->next = item->next;
00713                 }
00714                 item->next = hash->nextFree;
00715                 hash->nextFree = item;
00716                 hash->size--;
00717             }
00718             return(value);
00719         }
00720         prev = item;
00721         item = item->next;
00722     }
00723     return(NULL);
00724 
00725 } /* end of cuddHashTableLookup */

00741 int
00742 cuddHashTableInsert1(
00743   DdHashTable * hash,
00744   DdNode * f,
00745   DdNode * value,
00746   ptrint count)
00747 {
00748     int result;
00749     unsigned int posn;
00750     DdHashItem *item;
00751 
00752 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00753     assert(hash->keysize == 1);
00754 #endif
00755 
00756     if (hash->size > hash->maxsize) {
00757         result = cuddHashTableResize(hash);
00758         if (result == 0) return(0);
00759     }
00760     item = cuddHashTableAlloc(hash);
00761     if (item == NULL) return(0);
00762     hash->size++;
00763     item->value = value;
00764     cuddRef(value);
00765     item->count = count;
00766     item->key[0] = f;
00767     posn = ddLCHash2(f,f,hash->shift);
00768     item->next = hash->bucket[posn];
00769     hash->bucket[posn] = item;
00770 
00771     return(1);
00772 
00773 } /* end of cuddHashTableInsert1 */

00775 
00793 DdNode *
00794 cuddHashTableLookup1(
00795   DdHashTable * hash,
00796   DdNode * f)
00797 {
00798     unsigned int posn;
00799     DdHashItem *item, *prev;
00800 
00801 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00802     assert(hash->keysize == 1);
00803 #endif
00804 
00805     posn = ddLCHash2(f,f,hash->shift);
00806     item = hash->bucket[posn];
00807     prev = NULL;
00808 
00809     while (item != NULL) {
00810         DdNodePtr *key = item->key;
00811         if (f == key[0]) {
00812             DdNode *value = item->value;
00813             cuddSatDec(item->count);
00814             if (item->count == 0) {
00815                 cuddDeref(value);
00816                 if (prev == NULL) {
00817                     hash->bucket[posn] = item->next;
00818                 } else {
00819                     prev->next = item->next;
00820                 }
00821                 item->next = hash->nextFree;
00822                 hash->nextFree = item;
00823                 hash->size--;
00824             }
00825             return(value);
00826         }
00827         prev = item;
00828         item = item->next;
00829     }
00830     return(NULL);
00831 
00832 } /* end of cuddHashTableLookup1 */

00848 int
00849 cuddHashTableInsert2(

00855 {
00856     int result;
00857     unsigned int posn;
00858     DdHashItem *item;

00861     assert(hash->keysize == 2);

00866         if (result == 0) return(0);

00869     if (item == NULL) return(0);
00870     hash->size++;
00871     item->value = value;

00875     item->key[1] = g;
00876     posn = ddLCHash2(f,g,hash->shift);

00884 
00902 DdNode *
00903 cuddHashTableLookup2(
00904   DdHashTable * hash,
00905   DdNode * f,
00906   DdNode * g)
00907 {
00908     unsigned int posn;
00909     DdHashItem *item, *prev;
00910 
00911 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00912     assert(hash->keysize == 2);
00913 #endif
00914 
00915     posn = ddLCHash2(f,g,hash->shift);
00916     item = hash->bucket[posn];
00917     prev = NULL;
00918 
00919     while (item != NULL) {
00920         DdNodePtr *key = item->key;
00921         if ((f == key[0]) && (g == key[1])) {
00922             DdNode *value = item->value;
00923             cuddSatDec(item->count);
00924             if (item->count == 0) {
00925                 cuddDeref(value);
00926                 if (prev == NULL) {
00927                     hash->bucket[posn] = item->next;
00928                 } else {
00929                     prev->next = item->next;
00930                 }
00931                 item->next = hash->nextFree;
00932                 hash->nextFree = item;
00933                 hash->size--;
00934             }
00935             return(value);
00936         }
00937         prev = item;
00938         item = item->next;
00939     }
00940     return(NULL);
00941 
00942 } /* end of cuddHashTableLookup2 */

00958 int
00959 cuddHashTableInsert3(
00960   DdHashTable * hash,
00961   DdNode * f,
00962   DdNode * g,
00963   DdNode * h,
00964   DdNode * value,
00965   ptrint count)

00973 #endif

00976         result = cuddHashTableResize(hash);
00977         if (result == 0) return(0);
00978     }
00979     item = cuddHashTableAlloc(hash);
00980     if (item == NULL) return(0);

00983     cuddRef(value);
00984     item->count = count;
00985     item->key[0] = f;
00986     item->key[1] = g;
00987     item->key[2] = h;

00989     item->next = hash->bucket[posn];

00991 
00992     return(1);

00996 
01014 DdNode *
01015 cuddHashTableLookup3(
01016   DdHashTable * hash,
01017   DdNode * f,
01018   DdNode * g,
01019   DdNode * h)
01020 {
01021     unsigned int posn;
01022     DdHashItem *item, *prev;
01023 
01024 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01025     assert(hash->keysize == 3);
01026 #endif
01027 
01028     posn = ddLCHash3(f,g,h,hash->shift);
01029     item = hash->bucket[posn];
01030     prev = NULL;
01031 
01032     while (item != NULL) {
01033         DdNodePtr *key = item->key;
01034         if ((f == key[0]) && (g == key[1]) && (h == key[2])) {
01035             DdNode *value = item->value;
01036             cuddSatDec(item->count);
01037             if (item->count == 0) {
01038                 cuddDeref(value);
01039                 if (prev == NULL) {
01040                     hash->bucket[posn] = item->next;
01041                 } else {
01042                     prev->next = item->next;
01043                 }
01044                 item->next = hash->nextFree;
01045                 hash->nextFree = item;
01046                 hash->size--;
01047             }
01048             return(value);
01049         }
01050         prev = item;
01051         item = item->next;
01052     }
01053     return(NULL);
01054 
01055 } /* end of cuddHashTableLookup3 */
01056 
01057 
01058 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01059 /* Definition of static functions                                            */
01060 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01061 
01062 
01074 static void
01075 cuddLocalCacheResize(
01076   DdLocalCache * cache)
01077 {
01078     DdLocalCacheItem *item, *olditem, *entry, *old;
01079     int i, shift;
01080     unsigned int posn;
01081     unsigned int slots, oldslots;
01082     extern void (*MMoutOfMemory)(long);
01083     void (*saveHandler)(long);
01084 
01085     olditem = cache->item;
01086     oldslots = cache->slots;
01087     slots = cache->slots = oldslots << 1;
01088 
01089 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
01090     (void) fprintf(stderr,"Resizing local cache from %d to %d entries\n",
01091                 oldslots, slots);
01092     (void) fprintf(stderr,"\thits = %d\tlookups = %d\thit ratio = %5.3f\n",
01093                 cache->hits, cache->lookUps,
01094                 (double) cache->hits / (double) cache->lookUps);
01095 #endif
01096 
01097     saveHandler = MMoutOfMemory;
01098     MMoutOfMemory = Cudd_OutOfMem;
01099     cache->item = item =
01100         (DdLocalCacheItem *) ALLOC(char, slots * cache->itemsize);
01101     MMoutOfMemory = saveHandler;
01102     /* If we fail to allocate the new table we just give up. */
01103     if (item == NULL) {
01104 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
01105         (void) fprintf(stderr,"Resizing failed. Giving up.\n");
01106 #endif
01107         cache->slots = oldslots;
01108         cache->item = olditem;
01109         /* Do not try to resize again. */
01110         cache->maxslots = oldslots - 1;
01111         return;
01112     }
01113     shift = --(cache->shift);
01114     cache->manager->memused += (slots - oldslots) * cache->itemsize;
01115 
01116     /* Clear new cache. */
01117     memset(item, 0, slots * cache->itemsize);
01118 
01119     /* Copy from old cache to new one. */
01120     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < oldslots; i++) {
01121         old = (DdLocalCacheItem *) ((char *) olditem + i * cache->itemsize);
01122         if (old->value != NULL) {
01123             posn = ddLCHash(old->key,cache->keysize,slots);
01124             entry = (DdLocalCacheItem *) ((char *) item +
01125                                           posn * cache->itemsize);
01126             memcpy(entry->key,old->key,cache->keysize*sizeof(DdNode *));
01127             entry->value = old->value;  
01128         }
01129     }
01130 
01131     FREE(olditem);
01132 
01133     /* Reinitialize measurements so as to avoid division by 0 and
01134     ** immediate resizing.
01135     */
01136     cache->lookUps = (double) (int) (slots * cache->minHit + 1);
01137     cache->hits = 0;
01138 
01139 } /* end of cuddCacheResize */
01140 
01141 
01154 DD_INLINE
01155 static unsigned int
01156 ddLCHash(
01157   DdNodePtr * key,
01158   unsigned int keysize,
01159   int shift)
01160 {
01161     unsigned int val = (unsigned int) (ptrint) key[0];
01162     unsigned int i;
01163 
01164     for (i = 1; i < keysize; i++) {
01165         val = val * DD_P1 + (int) (ptrint) key[i];
01166     }
01167 
01168     return(val >> shift);
01169 
01170 } /* end of ddLCHash */
01171 
01172 
01184 static void
01185 cuddLocalCacheAddToList(
01186   DdLocalCache * cache)
01187 {
01188     DdManager *manager = cache->manager;
01189 
01190     cache->next = manager->localCaches;
01191     manager->localCaches = cache;
01192     return;
01193 
01194 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheAddToList */
01195 
01196 
01208 static void
01209 cuddLocalCacheRemoveFromList(
01210   DdLocalCache * cache)
01211 {
01212     DdManager *manager = cache->manager;
01213 #ifdef __osf__
01214 #pragma pointer_size save
01215 #pragma pointer_size short
01216 #endif
01217     DdLocalCache **prevCache, *nextCache;
01218 #ifdef __osf__
01219 #pragma pointer_size restore
01220 #endif
01221 
01222     prevCache = &(manager->localCaches);
01223     nextCache = manager->localCaches;
01224 
01225     while (nextCache != NULL) {
01226         if (nextCache == cache) {
01227             *prevCache = nextCache->next;
01228             return;
01229         }
01230         prevCache = &(nextCache->next);
01231         nextCache = nextCache->next;
01232     }
01233     return;                     /* should never get here */
01234 
01235 } /* end of cuddLocalCacheRemoveFromList */
01236 
01237 
01250 static int
01251 cuddHashTableResize(
01252   DdHashTable * hash)
01253 {
01254     int j;
01255     unsigned int posn;
01256     DdHashItem *item;
01257     DdHashItem *next;
01258 #ifdef __osf__
01259 #pragma pointer_size save
01260 #pragma pointer_size short
01261 #endif
01262     DdNode **key;
01263     int numBuckets;
01264     DdHashItem **buckets;
01265     DdHashItem **oldBuckets = hash->bucket;
01266 #ifdef __osf__
01267 #pragma pointer_size restore
01268 #endif
01269     int shift;
01270     int oldNumBuckets = hash->numBuckets;
01271     extern void (*MMoutOfMemory)(long);
01272     void (*saveHandler)(long);
01273 
01274     /* Compute the new size of the table. */
01275     numBuckets = oldNumBuckets << 1;
01276     saveHandler = MMoutOfMemory;
01277     MMoutOfMemory = Cudd_OutOfMem;
01278 #ifdef __osf__
01279 #pragma pointer_size save
01280 #pragma pointer_size short
01281 #endif
01282     buckets = hash->bucket = ALLOC(DdHashItem *, numBuckets);
01283     MMoutOfMemory = saveHandler;
01284     if (buckets == NULL) {
01285         hash->maxsize <<= 1;
01286         return(1);
01287     }
01288 
01289     hash->numBuckets = numBuckets;
01290     shift = --(hash->shift);
01291     hash->maxsize <<= 1;
01292     memset(buckets, 0, numBuckets * sizeof(DdHashItem *));
01293 #ifdef __osf__
01294 #pragma pointer_size restore
01295 #endif
01296     if (hash->keysize == 1) {
01297         for (j = 0; j < oldNumBuckets; j++) {
01298             item = oldBuckets[j];
01299             while (item != NULL) {
01300                 next = item->next;
01301                 key = item->key;
01302                 posn = ddLCHash2(key[0], key[0], shift);
01303                 item->next = buckets[posn];
01304                 buckets[posn] = item;
01305                 item = next;
01306             }
01307         }
01308     } else if (hash->keysize == 2) {
01309         for (j = 0; j < oldNumBuckets; j++) {
01310             item = oldBuckets[j];
01311             while (item != NULL) {
01312                 next = item->next;
01313                 key = item->key;
01314                 posn = ddLCHash2(key[0], key[1], shift);
01315                 item->next = buckets[posn];
01316                 buckets[posn] = item;
01317                 item = next;
01318             }
01319         }
01320     } else if (hash->keysize == 3) {
01321         for (j = 0; j < oldNumBuckets; j++) {
01322             item = oldBuckets[j];
01323             while (item != NULL) {
01324                 next = item->next;
01325                 key = item->key;
01326                 posn = ddLCHash3(key[0], key[1], key[2], shift);
01327                 item->next = buckets[posn];
01328                 buckets[posn] = item;
01329                 item = next;
01330             }
01331         }
01332     } else {
01333         for (j = 0; j < oldNumBuckets; j++) {
01334             item = oldBuckets[j];
01335             while (item != NULL) {
01336                 next = item->next;
01337                 posn = ddLCHash(item->key, hash->keysize, shift);
01338                 item->next = buckets[posn];
01339                 buckets[posn] = item;
01340                 item = next;
01341             }
01342         }
01343     }
01344     FREE(oldBuckets);
01345     return(1);
01346 
01347 } /* end of hashResize */
01348 
01349 
01364 DD_INLINE
01365 static DdHashItem *
01366 cuddHashTableAlloc(
01367   DdHashTable * hash)
01368 {
01369     int i;
01370     unsigned int itemsize = hash->itemsize;
01371 #ifdef __osf__
01372 #pragma pointer_size save
01373 #pragma pointer_size short
01374 #endif
01375     DdHashItem **mem, *thisOne, *next, *item;
01376 
01377     if (hash->nextFree == NULL) {
01378         mem = (DdHashItem **) ALLOC(char,(DD_MEM_CHUNK+1) * itemsize);
01379 #ifdef __osf__
01380 #pragma pointer_size restore
01381 #endif
01382         if (mem == NULL) {
01383             hash->manager->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01384             return(NULL);
01385         }
01386 
01387         mem[0] = (DdHashItem *) hash->memoryList;
01388         hash->memoryList = mem;
01389 
01390         thisOne = (DdHashItem *) ((char *) mem + itemsize);
01391         hash->nextFree = thisOne;
01392         for (i = 1; i < DD_MEM_CHUNK; i++) {
01393             next = (DdHashItem *) ((char *) thisOne + itemsize);
01394             thisOne->next = next;
01395             thisOne = next;
01396         }
01397 
01398         thisOne->next = NULL;
01399 
01400     }
01401     item = hash->nextFree;
01402     hash->nextFree = item->next;
01403     return(item);
01404 
01405 } /* end of cuddHashTableAlloc */
